articles.author: Rob Picheta, CNN
articles.title: Black people in the UK four times more likely to die from Covid-19 than white people, new data shows
articles.description: Black people in the UK are four times more likely to die from Covid-19 than white people and a number of other ethnic groups are also at an increased risk, according to new data released Thursday.
